## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation at x=-9.5, y=-0.5
This structure is set up to generate power but is currently not fully operational as the boiler is out of fuel and the steam engine is not connected to any power network.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
*   Boiler at position (x=-2.0, y=1.5)
*   Steam Engine at position (x=1.5, y=7.5)
*   PipeGroup connecting the pump to the boiler (fluid=water, status=EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT, pipes=[(x=-8.5,y=-0.5), (x=-7.5,y=-0.5), (x=-2.5,y=-0.5), (x=-1.5,y=-0.5)])
*   PipeGroup connecting the boiler to the steam engine (status=EntityStatus.EMPTY, pipes=[(x=-3.5,y=1.5), (x=-3.5,y=2.5
